column5: I would like to try fishing for the rainbow that are around the pens on Georgian Bay.  But i dont know of a good place to try.  Does anyone know of a place that i can try?  The closer to Parrysound the better.  Thankyou for any help.

We used to fish off Parry Island after we heard they lost 25,000 trout through holes in thier pens.....we always caught fish,just remember to pay as you cross the swing bridge onto the island......We fished at the old coal docks where it drops right off to about 40'..............TC and tight lines.....Chuck....
Hi Glen  might be fishing there this weekend, you can launch out of the salt docks or from kilbear park, depends were you are.  ray
Thanks for the info Bigchev and rayfish.  I see that the fishing is good at the north channel on the top of GB.  But that is a six hour drive for me. I am still undecided.
